titleStmt.title: A letter of a Catholike man beyond the seas, written to his friend in England including another of Peter Coton priest, of the Society of Iesus, to the Queene Regent of France / translated out of French into English ; touching the imputation of the death of Henry the IIII, late K. of France, to priests, Iesuites, or Catholicke doctrine.
titleStmt.author: Owen, Thomas, 1557-1618.
Coton, Pierre, 1564-1626.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.A. [i.e. Adonenus or Owen].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
